author: RIMorrisJr
title: Outstanding - Review
text:
La RÃ©serve is one of the best; as simple as that. We visited for my birthday, and the entire experience was special including dining and the spa. I want to mention in particular the hotel staff, who were helpful, friendly and creative - all of which made for a very memorable stay.
Room Tip: Ask for a view of the Eiffel Tower, very special at night. See more room tips
